name: Rithika Vennamaneni
title: Founding Product Engineer (Systems & UX)
tagline: Product-minded engineer building inspectable AI systems and calm UX.
summary: I design and ship human-in-the-loop AI tools with clear controls, fast feedback, and careful UX. I own the path from problem framing to production and iteration.
bio: MS Information Management @ UIUC (GPA 3.95/4) with a systems + UX lens. I build inspectable AI workflows, multi-agent tools, and clean interfaces that help people make decisions with confidence. I care about accessibility, guardrails, and end-to-end ownership.
availability: Open to Founding Product Engineer (Systems & UX) roles
